settings.title: Contact Us
settings.text: Need to get in touch? Have a look at the questions below, or reach out to us for more information.

settings.title: Low Prices, Just For You
settings.text: With constantly low prices, we also offer discounts and giveaways on our socials!

settings.title: Local UK Shipping
settings.text: We deliver to anywhere in mainland UK, shipped within 72 hours of your order.

settings.title: 24 Hour Processing
settings.text: We normally process orders within 24 hours and ship out the following day.

settings.title: Flexible Payments
settings.text: We offer a wide range of payment methods - all standard card payments are accepted, alongside PayPal and mobile payments.

settings.faq_question: How can I place an order on your website?
settings.faq_answer:
Placing an order on our website is simple! Just follow these steps:

  1. Browse and select: Find the item you want and click "Add to Cart."
  2. Review your cart: Make sure everything is correct.
  3. Proceed to checkout: Enter your shipping and billing information.
  4. Place your order: Review and click "Place Order."

That's it! You'll receive an order confirmation via email. If you have any questions, our customer support team is here to help.

settings.faq_question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.faq_answer:
We accept a variety of convenient payment methods to ensure a seamless checkout experience. Currently, we accept the following payment options:

  1. Credit and Debit Cards: We gladly accept major credit and debit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. Simply enter your card details during checkout.
  2. PayPal: For added flexibility and security, we offer PayPal as a payment method. If you have a PayPal account, you can choose this option and complete your purchase using your PayPal balance, linked bank account, or credit card.
  3. Mobile Wallets: We also support popular mobile wallet services such as Apple Pay and Google Pay. If you prefer to use these digital payment methods, select the respective option at checkout and follow the prompts on your device.

Please note that available payment methods may vary depending on your location and currency. Rest assured, we prioritize the security of your transactions and implement industry-standard encryption to protect your payment information.

If you have any further questions regarding payment methods or encounter any difficulties during checkout, our customer support team will be more than happy to assist you.

Unfortunately, at the moment, we do not offer international shipping. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Our shipping services are currently limited to United Kingdom, with no shipping to NI. We understand that this may be disappointing for customers located outside of these areas.

However, we are continuously exploring options to expand our shipping capabilities and reach customers in more countries. We recommend checking back in the future as we may update our shipping policies to include international destinations.

If you have any further questions or require assistance with alternative shipping options, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team. We are here to help and provide alternative solutions to ensure your satisfaction.

settings.faq_question: What is your return and refund policy?
How long does it take for my order to be processed and shipped?
settings.faq_answer: We aim to process and ship your order promptly. Our typical processing time is within 24 hours, and we ship orders from Monday to Friday (excluding bank holidays). Please note that shipping time may vary based on your location and chosen shipping method. Once your order is shipped, you'll receive a confirmation email with tracking information. If you have any concerns, our customer support team is here to assist you.

settings.faq_question: Can I track the status of my order?
settings.faq_answer:
Yes, you can track the status of your order. Simply contact our team at contact@jpcoutlet.co.uk, and they will provide you with the necessary shipping details. Our dedicated customer support team is available to assist you with any inquiries regarding the progress of your order. Please reach out to them via email, and they will promptly provide you with the relevant information you need.

If you have any further questions or require additional assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team at contact@jpcoutlet.co.uk. They will be happy to assist you in tracking the status of your order.

settings.faq_question: Are my personal and payment details secure on your website?
settings.faq_answer:
We prioritize the security of your personal and payment details. Our website utilizes industry-standard security measures to ensure the protection of your sensitive information. We employ encryption protocols and secure socket layer (SSL) technology to safeguard your data during transmission. Additionally, we adhere to strict privacy policies and maintain confidentiality in handling your personal information.

We do not store your payment details on our servers. Payment processing is securely handled by trusted and reputable payment service providers that comply with stringent security standards.

Rest assured that we take the necessary precautions to create a secure shopping environment. If you have any specific concerns or questions regarding the security of your personal and payment details, please feel free to reach out to our customer support team. They are available to address any inquiries or provide further information regarding our website's security measures.

settings.faq_question: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
settings.faq_answer:
Yes, we offer a range of discounts and promotions to enhance your shopping experience. All of our stock is heavily discounted, allowing you to enjoy competitive prices on our products. Additionally, we frequently run giveaways on our social media platforms, providing opportunities for you to participate and potentially win exciting prizes.

To stay up to date with our latest discounts, promotions, and giveaways, we encourage you to follow us on our social media channels. This way, you'll be among the first to know about any upcoming offers or special deals.

If you have any specific questions regarding discounts or promotions, feel free to reach out to our customer support team. They will be more than happy to provide you with further information and assist you with any inquiries you may have.

settings.faq_question: What if I have a problem with my order or need customer support?
settings.faq_answer: If you encounter any issues with your order or require customer support, we are here to assist you. Please reach out to our dedicated customer service team via email at contact@jpcoutlet.co.uk. They will promptly address your concerns and provide the necessary support to resolve any problems you may be experiencing.

settings.faq_question: How can I contact your customer service team?
settings.faq_answer:
If you need to get in touch with our customer service team, please feel free to contact us via email at contact@jpcoutlet.co.uk. Our dedicated customer service representatives are ready to assist you with any inquiries, concerns, or support you may require.

Whether you have questions about your order, need assistance with product information, or have any other customer service-related inquiries, our team is here to provide you with timely and helpful support.
